title: Super Bowl - monetary compensation for players playing in the game 2011 to 2020
summary: Overall Winning team, and Loosing team are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The order of lines according to average values of SOME LABEL, in descending order is: 1. Winning team, and lastly, 2. Loosing team.
The minimum SOME LABEL about 49.0, occured at 2014 by Loosing team.
The greatest difference of SOME LABEL between Winning team and Loosing team occurs at Year 2017 and the smallest difference occurs at 2014.
